title: STAGES View (ACCOUNT_USAGE): New Column STORAGE_INTEGRATION | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the ACCOUNT_USAGE.STAGES view includes the following new column:

The name of the storage integration associated with the stage; NULL for
internal stages or stages that do not use a storage integration.
